movies.name: Inception
movies.description: Leonardo DiCaprio boshchiligida tushlar ichida sayohat qiluvchi g'ayrioddiy jamoa haqida ilmiy-fantastik film.

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman o'zining eng katta dushmani Joker bilan yuzlashadigan epik superqahramon filmi.

movies.name: Interstellar
movies.description: Kelajakda insoniyatning omon qolishi uchun kosmosga safar qilgan bir guruh astronavtlar haqidagi ilmiy-fantastik film.

movies.name: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: Quentin Tarantino tomonidan yaratilgan gangsterlar, sevgi va jinoyat to‘qnashgan, murakkab hikoyalar ketma-ketligi.

movies.name: The Matrix
movies.description: Texnologik distopiyada yashirin haqiqiy dunyoni kashf etgan Neo ismli yigit haqida fantastik film.

movies.name: Fight Club
movies.description: Anonim kurash klubi tashkil etuvchi ikki erkakning hayoti va ichki to‘qnashuvlari haqida psixologik drama.

movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Nohaq ayblanib qamoqqa tushgan Andy Dufresne ismli odamning ozodlikka bo'lgan kurashi.

movies.name: Forrest Gump
movies.description: Aqli zaif bo'lishiga qaramay hayotdagi ko'plab yutuqlarga erishgan Forrest ismli odamning hayot hikoyasi.

movies.name: The Godfather
movies.description: Mafiya oilasi ichida hokimiyat uchun kurash va oilaviy rishtalar haqidagi epik drama.

movies.name: Avatar
movies.description: James Cameron tomonidan suratga olingan ilmiy-fantastik film. Bu filmda insonlar boshqa sayyorada yashashni boshlaydilar.

movies.name: Gladiator
movies.description: Maksimus ismli jangchining Rim imperiyasi bilan to'qnashuvlari haqida epik drama.

movies.name: Titanic
movies.description: Titanik kemasi halokati va ikki yosh sevgilining fojiali hikoyasi.

movies.name: The Social Network
movies.description: Facebook ijtimoiy tarmog'ining yaratilishi va uning asoschilarining hikoyasi.

movies.name: Joker
movies.description: Jokerning shaxsiy hayoti va ruhiy tushkunligi haqida film.

movies.name: The Irishman
movies.description: Frank Sheeran ismli mafiyachi qotilning hayoti va jinoyat dunyosidagi ishi haqida hikoya.

movies.name: Django Unchained
movies.description: O'z ozodligini qidirmoqda bo'lgan qul va uning sayohati haqida film.

movies.name: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: Post-apokaliptik dunyoda tirik qolish uchun kurashayotgan bir guruh insonlar haqida ilmiy
